baseUrl.description: The base url queries built with this widget will go to

results.title: Results
results.description: Contains all the information the dashboard needs to fetch and parse results

resultColumn.title: Result column
resultColumn.description: Describes the columns to be made available in the output

accessPath.description: a string defining the path to the specified object property

label.description: an optional string prescribing the display label of the field

name.description: a string defining the name of the property for this column

valueType.description: a string defining the type of property we are displaying

filters.title: Filters
filters.description: Contains all the information the dashboard needs to perform filtering of results

filterColumn.title: Filter column
filterColumn.description: Describes the columns the output is able to filter on

filterPath.description: a string defining the path on which we must filter for this property

label.description: an optional string prescribing the display label of the field

name.description: a string defining the name of the property for this column

valueType.description: a string defining the type of property we are filtering on

enumValues.description: A collection of options for the value, where valueType is 'Enum'

item.description: a string containing a comparator for this filter value, eg '>' or '=='

comparators.description: An array of comparators valid for this filter

enumValues.title: Enum Values
enumValues.description: One of the enum values for the field

label.description: An optional label to replace the value of the enum

sort.title: Sort
sort.description: Contains all the information the dashboard needs to perform sorting of results

sortColumn.title: Sort column
sortColumn.description: Describes the columns the output is able to sort on

sortPath.description: a string defining the path on which we must sort for this property

label.description: an optional string prescribing the display label of the field

name.description: a string defining the name of the property for this column

configurableProperties.title: Other properties
configurableProperties.description: A collection of other properties which can be configured/made configurable

urlLink.title: URL link
urlLink.description: An external link to be accessed at the bottom of the widget

defValue.description: an optional string containing a default link

numberOfRows.title: Number of rows
numberOfRows.description: Define the max amount of entries to return from the endpoint

defValue.description: an optional string containing a default number of rows

configurable.description: A true/false value which determines whether the user can configure beyond the default or not
